alert.note: Alert for Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Levy; Inland Pasco; Polk; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 02 at 7:55PM EDT until May 03 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...CRITICALLY LOW HUMIDITY WITH GUSTY WINDS AND HIGH ERC WILL RESULT IN ELEVATED FIRE DANGER ON WEDNESDAY... .Humidity values will decrease tomorrow in the wake of a cold front. Meanwhile, breezy conditions coupled with low afternoon humidity and high ERC values will combine to create an elevated fire danger. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY WITH HIGH ERC VALUES FOR PARTS OF THE NATURE COAST AND INTERIOR CENTRAL FLORIDA... The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Ruskin has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity with high ERC values, which is in effect Wednesday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Sumter, Polk, Inland Levy, Inland Citrus, Inland Hernando and Inland Pasco. * WINDS...Northwest around 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...25-35 percent. * ERC...30 to 40. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Levy; Inland Pasco; Polk; Sumter
